pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, March 24, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Media appearances

8:30 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on CIBM 107.

8:50 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on 107.7 Estrie.

1:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister on The Bridge with Peter Mansbridge will air on SiriusXM channel 167, CANADA TALKS.
